EmailTemplate.name: Tiada Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Great meeting you at TIADA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
We are excited for you to learn more about ACV Auctions. One of our experienced business development representatives will be reaching out to you shortly.
In the interim, if you have any questions please call me directly at 1-800-553-4070.
Sincerely,
Dealership Onboarding Team
